Rulings.Edison:
●You can't select occupied Monster Card Zones with Ojama King’s effect. If your opponent has 5 monsters on the field, then Ojama King’s effect is not applied.
●Ojama King’s effect activates and you select up to 3 Monster Card Zones when Ojama King becomes face-up on the field.
●If you select up to 3 Monster Card Zones and your Ojama King is flipped face-down, the Monster Card Zones are usable again. When Ojama King is flipped face-up again, you can select up to 3 Monster Card Zones again.
●If you take control of your opponent’s face-up Ojama King, you can't select new Monster Card Zones because the zones are selected when Ojama King becomes face-up on the field.

●If you select up to 3 Monster Zones and your Ojama King is Set, the Monster Zones are usable again. When Ojama King is flipped face-up again, you can select up to 3 Monster Zones again.
●If you take control of your opponent’s face-up Ojama King, you cannot select new Monster Zones because the zones are selected when Ojama King becomes face-up on the field.

Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot select occupied Monster Card Zones with the effect of "Ojama King". If your opponent has 5 monsters on the field, then the effect of "Ojama King" is not applied.
2. The effect of "Ojama King" activates and you select up to 3 Monster Card Zones when "Ojama King" becomes face-up on the field.
3. If you select up to 3 Monster Card Zones and your "Ojama King" is flipped face-down, the Monster Card Zones are usable again. When "Ojama King" is flipped face-up again, you can select up to 3 Monster Card Zones again.
4. If you take control of your opponent's face-up "Ojama King", you cannot select new Monster Card Zones because the zones are selected when "Ojama King" becomes face-up on the field.

"Ojama Green" + "Ojama Yellow" + "Ojama Black"
